skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: As the corruption of Chaos seeps into the land like a sickness, the glory and strength of those forces pledged eternally to Ruin can only grow and grow.
The corruption of Chaos infects all it touches, stretching its dark tendrils out across the land.
The provinces shall bloat with wonderous corruption, expanding amidst the glory of success.
Chaos grips the local populace with an iron fist, discouraging all disorder lest it tighten and choke.
Many servants of Chaos are connected by a Ruinous web that joins their forces in common cause.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca
Diplomatic relations: +20 with Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca
Diplomatic relations: +30 with Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +250 metres without incurring any time penalty
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +600 metres without incurring any time penalty
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +1000 metres without incurring any time penalty

skillTree.localised_description: Raging and roaring in the cause of Chaos Undivided, the forces of Khorne bray for battle with even greater fury.
The unwholesome, decrepit warriors of Nurgle stand bolstered among the united forces of Chaos.
The unified forces of Chaos thrill the Lord of Change, who delights in seeing once-fierce enemies transformed into a weapon of untold annihilation.
Merged under a single Ruinous banner, the servants of Slaanesh find new pleasures within this unholy alliance.
Pure, irrepressible rage is but an act of worship to the Blood God's glory.
The dead and the dying have no use for material goods, and the living do not deserve to keep what they could not protect.
Khorne thrives in the wake of wanton destruction; let the towns and cities of his foes burn to the ground around them.
When you strike a warrior of Khorne, strike hard and with more strength than you dare, for what doesn't kill them only makes them stronger, and angrier.

effects.description:
Armour: +6 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne, Forsaken of Khorne, Blood Shrine of Khorne, Skullreapers, Wrathmongers and Chaos Warriors of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne, Forsaken of Khorne, Blood Shrine of Khorne, Skullreapers, Wrathmongers and Chaos Warriors of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Blood God rewards the agents of His glory, for what strengthens the Lord of Murder so too bolsters his forces.

effects.description: Reign of Chaos: additional chance for Khorne rewards +5%

skillTree.localised_description: Warriors pledged to Khorne never tire of war, but are honed by battle fury into sharp instruments of violent rage.

effects.description:
Daemons Reforged: +10% chance for destroyed Daemons of Khorne units to be restored after battle

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: Astride terrifying mounts and riding rattling chariots of bone, the forces of Khorne are a whirlwind of pure destruction on the charge.

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Uncleanliness is next to Godliness.
The perils of passing through hostile terrain matter little when the Lord of Decay guides your path.

skillTree.localised_description: The true experience of divinity can be found in the ecstasy of indulgence.
Few need much persuasion to serve the Prince of Pleasure; the draw of pursuing one's every debased fantasy often proves too tempting to resist.
The Dark Prince rejoices to see such Chaos sown amongst his foes.
Though fighting with a graceful elegance, every strike from the warriors of Slaanesh lands with devastating impact.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh, Slaangors and Marauders of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The powers promised by Slaanesh are alluring indeed, and worth any price to acquire.

effects.description: Reign of Chaos: additional chance for Slaanesh rewards +5%

skillTree.localised_description: The pleasures of battle are often all that is needed to sate a warrior's appetite.

effects.description:
Daemons Reforged: +10% chance for destroyed Daemons of Slaanesh units to be restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The expression of surprise on an ambushed foe's face is always a particularly delectable treat.
Even the most monstrous creatures in the Dark Prince's armies possess a horrific sort of beauty, lulling their victims into the most fatal kind of complacency.

skillTree.localised_description: It is easy to be distracted by the beauty of Slaanesh's mounts, even as they close in to deliver your agonising death.

skillTree.localised_description: As the Dark Prince's malignant influence spreads, his followers are most delightfully rewarded with abilities beyond even their wildest dreams.

effects.description: Reign of Chaos: additional chance for Slaanesh rewards +10%

skillTree.localised_description: The art of combat is much like an intricate dance  fluid, graceful, and always building up to a killer finale.

skillTree.localised_description: Weapons should be as finely honed as the body, and both should be capable of inflicting the most wicked harm in Slaanesh's name.

skillTree.localised_description: Follow the changing winds, and the blessings of the Raven God can be earned amidst the tempest.
Allies of the Raven God lurk in every corner of the map, ready to change the tide of war from any direction.
The Winds of Magic dance around the Bringer of Change, swirling through the ranks of his Sorcerers, who draw power from its potent energies.

effects.description:
Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +5%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +5%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +10%
	(local province)

	(local province)

	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Their loyalty to the Raven God grants the warriors of Tzeentch a staunch hardiness in battle, for what is change if not the ability to overcome?

skillTree.localised_description: The warriors of Change are driven ever onward by motivations constantly in flux.

skillTree.localised_description: Every being desires change in some form or another, and a point of common interest is where all successful negotiations begin.
Racing into battle at great speed, the Tzeentchian cavalry put every bit of their momentum into each and every strike.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

factionEffects.localised_description: The act of god-slaying has drawn the attention of the Dark Powers, and now they war over this wretched prince's soul!

effects.description:
Recruitment health: +100% for all units
	(all armies)

Army ability: "Curse of the Slug"
	(all armies)

ui_effects.localised_text: Will spread to enemies within the Spread Range metres of affected unit
Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

ui_effects.localised_text: Will spread to friends within the Spread Range metres of affected unit

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is unable to activate abilities or cast spells.

ui_effects.localised_text: Entities cannot die while ability is active

attributes.bullet_text: Entities in this unit take damage, but cannot die.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

ui_effects.localised_text: Will spread to enemies within the Spread Range metres of affected unit
Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

effects.description: Access to all daemon units via Daemonic Glory
Reign of Chaos: inflicting damage with friendly Lords in battle will unlock random army abilities

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "The Dark Gods empower me, so vengeance will be mine."

effects.description: Customisable via Daemonic Gifts: Equippable gifts are granted through servitude to the Chaos Gods
Access to gifts of Chaos Undivided: These gifts are not directly influenced by any of the Chaos Gods to allow you to represent Chaos and all its glory
Access to gifts of Khorne: These gifts push your prowess in battle to take on any challenger foolish enough to meet you in combat
Access to gifts of Nurgle: These gifts allow you to spread pestilence, suffering and decay to all those who would seek to cause you harm
Access to gifts of Slaanesh: These gifts enable you to become an agile hunter able to chase down any prey that chooses to turn its back on you
Access to gifts of Tzeentch: These gifts grant you the level of knowledge in the Winds of Magic required to change the tides of battle
